title: Region bounded by SQRTx and y=6-x part - b

content.question: The region R is the base of a solid. For each y , where <math> <mrow> <mn> 0 </mn> <mo> ≤ </mo> <mi> y </mi> <mo> ≤ </mo> <mn> 2 </mn> </mrow> </math> , the cross section of the solid taken perpendicular to the y -axis is a rectangle whose base lies in R and whose height is 2 y . Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that gives the volume of the solid.

frqParts.text: The region R is the base of a solid. For each y , where <math> <mrow> <mn> 0 </mn> <mo> ≤ </mo> <mi> y </mi> <mo> ≤ </mo> <mn> 2 </mn> </mrow> </math> , the cross section of the solid taken perpendicular to the y -axis is a rectangle whose base lies in R and whose height is 2 y . Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that gives the volume of the solid.

topic.text: 8.7: Volumes with Cross Sections - Squares and Rectangles

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
